name: The Dirty Mind Game
description:
It's a party game with a dirty twist!

Split up into pairs to compete or just play as a group, it's up to you! Either way this game will be sure to have your mind in the gutter.

Words range from anatomically correct terms to positions to words that sound just plain nasty.

The person holding the phone can't say the word or any "rhymes with" clues, other than that the rules are up to you!

The timer is set for 60 seconds so all you need is players who are ready for some laughs with The Dirty Mind Game!
